    question => UTF-8 string (1006) "<p>1. Determine the nature and extent of accounting records the client has p...
    $value[0]['question']
    <p>1.	Determine the nature and extent of accounting records the client has prepared since the period end which can be reviewed by the auditor.  These may include:</p>
<ul>
    <li>a.	Subsequent interim financial statements;</li>
    <li>b.	Management accounts;</li>
    <li>c.	Budgets (to aid review of management accounts for unusual or unexpected items);</li>
    <li>d.	Nominal ledger, including material journals;</li>
    <li>e.	Sales and purchase records or invoices (including credit notes);</li>
    <li>f.	Payroll records;</li>
    <li>g.	Cashbooks.</li>
</ul>
<p><i>NB: It is not expected that all records highlighted above will be reviewed – the most appropriate records based on the client’s circumstances should be reviewed.</i></p>
<p>Document a review of these records.  In particular highlight the date these records have been prepared to and whether this is sufficiently close to the date of the audit report, or whether this work will need to be subsequently revisited.</p>
